hard: Dorian – once Dorian is hooked to the frontline he will be able to heal up all allies with his vampiric aura.
Andvari – Andvari will deny Cleaver from hooking allies to the frontline.
soft: Armor/magic defense penetration artifact – once his armor or magic defense is lowered he goes down really fast. Combine skills and attacks together to melt him down in a few seconds.
